land shape [landshape]: â‡” #1637 Wet One Captain

(cold-blooded [coldblood], amphibious [amphibian], need-not-eat [neednoteat])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
In the water-filled caverns and underground lakes of Agartha live Pale Ones that have adapted to a life in the water. They are known as Wet Ones. Wet Ones sometimes enter the salty depths of the seas where they compete with Atlantians and Tritons.
